summary: "Django Unchained" is a 2012 Western movie by Quentin Tarantino, set in the old South and West. It's about a slave, Django (Jamie Foxx), who teams up with a bounty hunter (Christoph Waltz) to find and free his wife from a cruel plantation owner (Leonardo DiCaprio). The movie is a cool mix of history and fictional "spaghetti Western" style. It was a big hit, making lots of money and winning important awards, especially for Waltz's acting and Tarantino's writing.
title: Django Unchained
